org.araneaframework.uilib.form
Interface FilteredInputControl

All Superinterfaces:
Component, Control, FormElementAware, java.io.Serializable, Service, Viewable, Widget
All Known Implementing Classes:
FloatControl, NumberControl, TextControl, TimestampControl
public interface FilteredInputControl
extends Control

Control that allows specifying InputFilter for restricting the end-user input into a field.

Since:
1.0.11
Author:
Taimo Peelo (taimo@araneaframework.org)
